  • Interfaces 
    Interface Description
    org.flowable.engine.Agenda
    in 6.2.0, use the Agenda in the common module instead.

    Class Description

    Use MailServerInfo

    Exceptions Description

  • Methods 
    Method Description
    org.flowable.engine.DecisionTableVariableManager.setDecisionServiceVariablesOnExecution​(Map<String, List<Map<String, Object>>>, String, DelegateExecution, ObjectMapper)
    org.flowable.engine.DecisionTableVariableManager.setVariablesOnExecution​(List<Map<String, Object>>, String, DelegateExecution, ObjectMapper)
    org.flowable.engine.history.HistoricProcessInstanceQuery.limitProcessInstanceVariables​(Integer)
    no longer needed, this is a noop
    org.flowable.engine.ProcessEngineConfiguration.getCleanInstancesEndedAfterNumberOfDays()
    use ProcessEngineConfiguration.getCleanInstancesEndedAfter() instead
    org.flowable.engine.ProcessEngineConfiguration.getProcessEngineLifecycleListener()
    Use AbstractEngineConfiguration.getEngineLifecycleListeners().
    org.flowable.engine.ProcessEngineConfiguration.setCleanInstancesEndedAfterNumberOfDays​(int)
    use ProcessEngineConfiguration.setCleanInstancesEndedAfter(Duration) instead
    org.flowable.engine.ProcessEngineConfiguration.setProcessEngineLifecycleListener​(ProcessEngineLifecycleListener)
    Use AbstractEngineConfiguration.setEngineLifecycleListeners(List).
    org.flowable.engine.RepositoryService.getDecisionTablesForProcessDefinition​(String)
    replaced by getDecisionsForProcessDefinition(String processDefinitionId)
    org.flowable.engine.runtime.ProcessInstanceQuery.limitProcessInstanceVariables​(Integer)
    no longer needed, this is a noop
